Uses of Class
simulator.payloads.Payload

  • Packages that use Payload 
    Package Description
    simulator.framework.faultmodels  
    simulator.payloads
    The message types that can be sent on the simulated network.

    • Uses of Payload in simulator.framework.faultmodels

      Methods in simulator.framework.faultmodels with parameters of type Payload 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean NetworkFaultModel.canDeliver(Payload payload)
      Ask fault model if the message can be delivered
      boolean DropMessagesFaultModel.canDeliver(Payload payload) 
      boolean BlockMessageFaultModel.canDeliver(Payload payload) 
      boolean BlackoutFaultModel.canDeliver(Payload payload) 
      boolean BERFaultModel.canDeliver(Payload payload) 
      boolean NetworkFaultModel.canStart(Payload payload)
      Notify the fault model that a message is starting
      boolean DropMessagesFaultModel.canStart(Payload payload) 
      boolean BlockMessageFaultModel.canStart(Payload payload) 
      boolean BlackoutFaultModel.canStart(Payload payload) 
      boolean BERFaultModel.canStart(Payload payload) 

    • Uses of Payload in simulator.payloads

      Subclasses of Payload in simulator.payloads 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AtFloorPayload
      Indicates True when the Car is above, below, or at Floor[f,b] but close enough that the Car should be traveling at slow speed to be able to stop level with Floor[f,b].
      class  CanMailbox
      CanMailbox is the Payload object that is used by the elevator.framework.CANNetwork.
      class  CarCallPayload
      Network messages indicate whether a car call has been requested for Hallway[f,b], and framework messages indicate whether the button is currently held down.
      class  CarLanternPayload
      Indicates whether the Up/Down arrows placed on the car doorframes are illuminated.
      class  CarLevelPositionPayload
      Reports approximate position of car in hoistway based on position sensors placed at 10 cm intervals in the hoistway.
      class  CarLightPayload
      Framework message sent by a controller is a command to the light actuator to turn the light on or off; framework message from the light indicates whether the light is on or off.
      class  CarPositionIndicatorPayload
      Framework message is a command to the Car Position Indicator to display the specified floor number to the Passengers in the Car.
      class  CarPositionPayload
      Internal framework message that indicates the exact position of the Car in the hoistway.
      class  CarWeightAlarmPayload
      Network message indicates whether the alarm inside the car is ringing; framework message is a command for the Car Weight Alarm to turn on or off.
      class  CarWeightPayload
      Network message indicates the observed weight (in tenths of pounds) of all Passengers in the Car according to the Car Weight Sensor.
      class  DoorClosedPayload
      Indicates whether a door is fully closed.
      class  DoorMotorPayload
      Framework message that commands the doors to open, close, nudge, or stop moving.
      class  DoorOpenPayload
      Indicates whether a door is fully open.
      class  DoorPositionPayload
      Internal framework message indicates how far open a door is.
      class  DoorReversalPayload
      Framework message indicates whether a door reversal switch has been triggered.
      class  DrivePayload
      Framework message commands the drive motor to move the Car up and down the hoistway.
      class  DriveSpeedPayload
      Indicates the current speed and direction of the drive motor.
      class  EmergencyBrakePayload
      Supplies emergency braking in case of safety violation such as hoistway limit over-run or movement with doors open.
      class  FaultPayload
      No Fault payloads are currently implemented, but if you wanted to fault specific objects, you can create a new payload class that descends from this class and use simulator.faults.FaultPayloadFault to inject it at certain times using the -ff file.
      class  HallCallPayload
      Network message indicates whether a hall call has been requested at Hallway[f,b] for direction d, and a framework message indicates whether the button is currently held down.
      class  HallLightPayload
      Framework message sent by a controller is a command to the light actuator to turn the light on or off; framework message from the light indicates whether the light is on or off.
      class  HoistwayLimitPayload
      A HoistwayLimit[d] switch activates when the car has over-run the hoistway limits and is in an emergency stopping situation.
      class  LevelingPayload
      Indicates True when the Car is above, below, or at Floor[f,b] but close enough that the Car should be traveling at slow speed to be able to stop level with Floor[f,b].
      class  PersonWeightPayload
      Indicates that a Passenger of a particular mass has entered or exited the car.
      class  PhysicalPayload
      A physical state value that is sent between components in the simulator.
      Methods in simulator.payloads that return Payload 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) Payload WriteablePayload.asPayload()
      This method that lets the network scheduler get the real payload class internally.
      (package private) Payload ReadablePayload.asPayload()
      This method that lets the network scheduler get the real payload class internally.
